website_summaries.verdict: Uses natural ingredients to improve the oral health of all ages of dogs.
pros: Dogs seem to like the taste, so they'll ingest the powder willingly
Can be sprinkled on food or can be applied with a toothbrush, depending on the dog's preference
Contains no artificial colorings or flavorings
Formula will reduce plaque and bad breath over a few weeks
cons: Some dogs may experience gastrointestinal discomfort with this formula

website_summaries.verdict: A dental supplement for cats featuring natural food ingredients to help prevent dental problems.
pros: Features natural cheeses, apple polyphenols, and minerals to improve bad breath and prevent plaque
Designed to be sprinkled onto food or can be used as a tooth powder to brush directly on teeth
cons: Some pickier cats don't like the taste

customer_reviews.title: "9 out of 10 dentists approved"
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired dentist. I have always been able to keep my large dog's teeth clean but I have two 8 pound dogs that refuse to let me clean their teeth. The small dogs' teeth were very dirty, with thick calculus on their upper molars. I decided to try this powder. I give each dog a small scoop each night right before bed. I also have started letting them chew bully sticks (the no odor ones) each evening. I can't believe the difference. It has taken about a month but the calculus has chipped off their molars and their breath is so much better. I didn't really believe this would work but it does. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: linda cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Really cleans my Shih Tsu's teeth!  Saved me $$$ over dental cleaning surgery!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old shih tsus had brown stuff on their teeth and were about to go in for a cleaning - where they would be put under for the procedure at about $200 per dog! The veterinarian suggested this product to use instead. We used it for about 6 weeks and my dogs teeth are white now! I feed it to them right before bed so they can't rinse it away with water sips. I am amazed! Plus my dogs love this stuff and think it is their bedtime treat!
customer_reviews.author: R L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Better breath!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 6 months, our dogs consider it a treat. I find the best way of remembering to use it is by preparing bowls containing it as I prepare their regular meals. When they finish eating I give them the Dentatreat. It is designed to be an anti-plaque treatment, to reduce build up that leads to bad breath and tooth-loss. Having recently spent $2600.00 on cleaning and extracting teeth on 2 pugs, we have begun to be more pro-active in keeping their teeth healthy. Dogs with reduced snout length have very crowded teeth. Wysong Dentatreat has made a difference for us. We highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leefers1

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Supplement for Dogs Teeth
customer_reviews.text: Actually, my dog LOVES it. Who knew CHEESE could help keep plaque from forming on canine teeth? It seems to be working, according to my Vet. I do brush her teeth about every 2-3 months; which she HATES. Instead of struggling to get a "dog toothbrush" into my Miniature Schnauzer's tiny little mouth, I can supplement the brushing with this yummy powder. Great that you can freeze it, so it doesn't "expire". I keep a small amount in the refrigerator for her daily meals. She LOVES this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Slightly Opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Best item on the market for taking care of your pet's canine health. I put about a tablespoon in a small bowl, wet the toothbrush and dip into it and apply in a brushing motion on my dog's gums and teeth. She gets to consume the rest if I don't use it all. I always do this at night before bed, so any residual powder left can sit and work inside her gums and teeth while resting. If I'm feeling a little lazy, I just let her consume the bowl of powder as is. She loves the taste and it's good for her digestive health too. Bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Was initially high price but worth it in dental care for your pet
customer_reviews.text: Vet told me to start taking care of my cats teeth so I bought this and my cat absolutely loves it. Very minimum work to get their teeth cleaned. Just pour the powder in with his food but it's more effective to just pour it in their bowl and they'll lick it clean since it's so tasty
customer_reviews.author: Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Improving tartar and gingivitis of cats’ teeth
customer_reviews.text: It’s really reduced the yellow calcified tartar on my cat’s teeth and I know more will continue to come off! Also is helping gum inflammation on my white cats gums, which is common for them. Consistency in use is key. They love the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: My very finicky kitty prefers it for its cheese flavor
customer_reviews.text: My very finicky kitty prefers this product over others I have tried yet he occasionally refuses this one too. My not as picky pup prefers another product but this is the only product that I have been able to get him to eat on its own as a treat. They seem to like the flavor and it smells like real cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Wai Like The Dead
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I pop the lid on this they literally start screaming and begging for it. I'll mix it in with their wet food or just put it on my fingers and hold on for dear life.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for my dogs. I have 2 pekingese dogs and for the last year or so, they've had recurring diarrhea that's probably coccidial in origin. Albon (sulfadimethoxine) will end an acute attack, but I don't like treating them repeatedly with antibiotics. Since I've started giving them a tsp of this every night, they've been doing much better. I'm giving them the DentaTreat more for the probiotics than as a dentrifice, but I think their teeth also are benefiting. I also don't feed them dry kibble and rarely feed them any kind of grain (corn, wheat, etc).
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Cheese works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how basically just cheese has made my dogs teeth go from stained dark-brown to just a slight yellow-brown, but it has. My dogs also go bonkers for the stuff, which I can't blame them as I also love cheese.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... this on my dogs food and they don't have bad breath anymore at the breath literally smells great
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkle this on my dogs food and they don't have bad breath anymore at the breath literally smells great. I guess it kills the bacteria on the teeth in the mouth! I love this item. They say healthy teeth and gums makes a healthy dog and a healthy dogs heart. I must have!
customer_reviews.author: SonjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No more bad doggie breath
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog (5 years old) and cat (6 years old) have been using the Wysong DentaTreat for about 2 years now and really love it. I just sprinkle it on their food twice a day. I was worried about the cat liking it because she is a really picky eater but she enjoys the cheese flavor. Their teeth look amazing and no bad doggie breath and neither of them ever had to get their teeth cleaned by the vet. I also make a paste out of it and brush their teeth with it. Only complaint is that it is a little pricy and doesn't last as long as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Eve K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teeth
customer_reviews.text: We have been sprinkling dentatreat on our Chihuahua's food since he joined our household. Not only does he like it, but we are convinced it helps with his dental hygiene. He is now 8 years old and last year was the first time he was in need of a dental cleaning. Our vet said we could even have put it off another year. The larger container lasts 3-4 months. A little pricey, but we prefer this over subjecting our pup to anesthesia and teeth cleaning more often.
customer_reviews.author: jacklenny

customer_reviews.title: tooth brush powder
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog who's teeth becomes bad very easy so I use the powder every day on her food, she does not mind it and with some brushing her teeth now do not get so much tarter build up on them
customer_reviews.author: Geri Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Really works - Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and his breath has truly improved since beginning daily use. The size is equal to three of the original size I purchased - for the same price! It really works to improve dog breath and this bottle is extremely economical!
customer_reviews.author: Jen RM

customer_reviews.title: My doggities LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I brush my little poms' teeth with this every night, and they can't get enough of it! It's as if a dentist told a patient s/he has to smear hot fudge sauce all over his/her mouth every night before going to bed--LOL! I use it as a tooth powder applied onto the doggies' dampened toothbrushes. Cheese changes the pH in the mouth and minimizes tartar buildup and resulting bad breath and dental decay. I've noticed a big difference with my girls' teeth since switching from traditional doggie toothpaste. Great product--highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our trainer
customer_reviews.text: How great is it to be able to sprinkle a little of this safe, made in USA product on your fur-end's dinner and have it as an important part of their daily care?!!! We have used it for all of our little poodles, who are reknown for having terrible dental health. Along with a program of daily brushing and vet care, I can truthfully say that my little girl at age 13.6 had not lost one tooth when we sadly lost her!!!! It absolutely makes a difference for them in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: boomerdk

customer_reviews.title: Great supplemental product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this is an excellent product to use in conjunction with regular daily brushing. I currently use it twice daily with my third little rescue poodle in conjunction with nightly toothbrushing. When I was a novice poodle parent, I started using it per recommendation of my trainer and I quickly found it to be a key factor in extending time between professional vet dental cleanings. I also trust the Wysong label! As with anything regarding our pets, we need to check with our vet.
customer_reviews.author: boomerdk

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a product that keeps my dog's teeth clean!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this product while searching non-vet way to keep my little dog's teeth clean (read: NOT a dental cleaning at the vet's office that requires an anesthesia) and I've been using this product about 8+ months and I absolutely love it. If you have a little dog, you know their teeth tend to get yuckier than a big dog's and this product has kept my dog's teeth clean which is such a relief as my dog lets me do anything to him except brushing his teeth. I've already had 5 of my friends/coworkers/neighbors hooked on this product as well - Wysong should pay me some PR $$$$ ;-)
customer_reviews.author: MB the GymRat

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My vet suggested Dentatreat when we took our dog Tucker in after rescuing him from the Humane Society. He checked Tuck over and estimated his age for us and said he noticed some tartar forming. A friend had suggested Dentatreat to him and he was having excellent results with his patients who were using it. I really dont understand how it works but it does, Tuck is now approx 10 years old and still hasn't needed his teeth cleaned. We used to have our other dogs teeth cleaned about every 5 years and its expensive and dangerous for pets. All in all a great product !
customer_reviews.author: Rmclan

customer_reviews.title: Dentatreat works!
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs that are getting this once a day with their food. In about 7 days I noticed their breath smelled better. After only two weeks, I could see the amount of plaque on their teeth was decreasing. It's a little on the expensive side if you see it as "a dietary supplement". I did the math and compared the cost of continuing a daily dosage of this for each dog, versus the cost and risks of annual dental cleanings for all three dogs. It costs less for the Dentatreat. The fact that I decrease the anesthesia risks to my pets is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Safe the dog's teeth while they lick their chops!
customer_reviews.text: For the last two years I have brushed my small dog's teeth daily with this product and she loves it because of the cheesy taste. The enzymes are helping to save her teeth. Having just adopted a retired greyhound who is not familiar with the idea of a toothbrush, it is possible to rub the Dentatreat on her gums and teeth. Maybe she will eventually except the brush, but in the meantime, we are protecting her dental health. I have seen much smaller containers for almost the same cost. The price is the best I have found. This is an excellent product at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This absolutely works.
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders on my dog's teeth. I have an older dog (almost 13), with lots of tartar build-up on his teeth. While I brush his teeth 3-4 times a week, the tartar still builds up. After using this product for 30 days, the tartar and stains began to disappear, and now his teeth look much healthier! I believe his breath smells better as well. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Removes plaque, helps keep breath fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for both of our dogs. It removes plaque and helps with breath control.
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: If your pets hate brushing, please try this!
customer_reviews.text: I tried another food additive for my pups that was supposed to help reduce tartar and plaque, but found out it had a base of soy protein, which is not very digestible by dogs, not to mention i couldn't figure out what country produced it. I was thrilled to find Wysong's Dentatreat because my pups (and cat) love cheese, so this really is like a treat that I sprinkle on their meals. Their teeth look better and they love it...can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: 4PupsMom

customer_reviews.title: Use 'Denta Trea't to save teeth.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very expensive, but we have three cats, and they don't let me brush their teeth. So we sprinkle this on their food twice a day. Sailor still goes in for a cleaning once a year but I felt his teeth were cleaner, using this product. Happy and Crystal are doing well on it too. Would recommend it to other cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy J Gayhart-Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Approve
customer_reviews.text: This product has definitely reduced the dogs smelly breath. I don't know if it will help with whitening long term but the dogs really enjoy the taste too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this on his food. You would think I’m feeding him a steak dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Black

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, one of which has a big problem with tartar. I've been using Denta Treat for a few years now and am amazed at how quickly it starts to clean the tartar off his teeth. I give it to my other 2 dogs as maintenance for a couple of weeks every few months. Great product, and it saves the dogs having to go to the vet for a dental. The dogs also love it!
customer_reviews.author: ILuvMaine

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is my second container. I am very pleased with my dogs clean teeth. I wouldn't have thought a powder could do such a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it's helping
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this and I've used it for the past year on their dry food every day. They had a checkup last week and their teeth seem to be doing better than before. Still some plaque buildup, but my one dog who had bad breath within 6 months of teeth cleaning, is now at 9 months and very little breath odor. I also use Tropiclean water treatment, also recommended by my vet, and have been using that for two years. Again, I think it helps their breath and plaque buildup. They both seem to help but they are not a cure.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: DentaTreats Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using DentaTreat for 2 months and already see a difference in the amount of plaque on our dogs' teeth. We sprinkle it on their dinner every night. Since we are unfortunately inconsistent with brushing their teeth, this has been a big help because we were getting concerned about having to take them for a cleaning which is expensive and brings the risk of anesthesia. I highly recommend this to all dog owners!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to keep Dog's teeth healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product that even the finicky eaters will love. Just sprinkle a bit of Denta Treat on their food once a day and the enzymatic action keeps the tartar from building up. Now we don't have to brush the dog's teeth as often, and it is a much easier job to perform when we do. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Schnauzers love it!
customer_reviews.text: My Two Schnauzers, a mini & a standard, love cheese, and this gets them to eat when we travel, as well as during daily feedings. Takes care of stinky breath, as it is suppose to work with the stomach acids to control the chemical compound of their saliva. Have not noticed an improvement, nor an increase, in dental tarter, so at least not an increase is good! I just ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy about taxes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my cat’s breath from becoming smelly. Also, fewer dental problems at the vet checkups.

customer_reviews.title: Every vet should recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me having to have my dogs' teeth cleaned. It really works as they claim. One old poodle whom the vet had said really needed to have his teeth cleaned had his teeth so cleared up by the next years' annual exam that the vet no longer recommended the cleaning. I've been using the Wysong for 5 years on my goldendoodles and they barely have any tartar.

customer_reviews.title: Effective at helping keep pets teeth cleaner!

customer_reviews.title: Dental care made easy for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this as a treat after her meal. It seems to be working. Her breath is fresh and her teeth are clean and healthy according to her Vet. Her teeth seem to clean more thoroughly during her bone chewing with the addition of this product.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pet teeth clean

customer_reviews.title: Bigtime woofs for this!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff. It seems to be keeping her teeth whiter. I also use the OraPup lickies with the tongue brush. They make a great combo if you want to keep your dog away from those expensive professional cleanings.

customer_reviews.title: so good. I just started my Brussels Griffon on this ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I just started my Brussels Griffon on this product a couple of weeks ago, and already i am noticing an improvement in her teeth. Her teeth were already in pretty good shape and I wanted to keep them that way. So far, it's working. Her teeth look great.

customer_reviews.title: doggie delicious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this especially for my greyhound. He's a sweetheart with bad breath. At least he was. After one month his breath has improved dramtically and teeth have less tarter. Neither he or our pug will eat their food without Wysong now!

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for doggie breath and clean teeth. I sprinkle it on two meals a day, and it helps keep their teeth healthy. Plus they love the taste. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective and Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: DentalTreat was recommended to me by my local pet supply store. I was skeptical because it seemed expensive, but I have been extremely pleased with the results. My rescue dog had large deposits of brown tartar when I started using it in her food. A short time later, she had immaculately white choppers, and her vet gave her two thumbs-up on dental health. One bottle lasts about 6 months for my dog, who weighs 70 lbs. Presumably, it would go further with a smaller dog. Dogs and cats love the taste (I use it in my cat's food as well).
customer_reviews.author: K.D. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best products I could ever recommend to a dog owner

Since using Denta treat we almost never have to worry about that again. The vet says her teeth look fantastic, and the groomer always says her teeth are clean, where before we ALWAYS had a bad grade on her teeth cleanliness.

Poodles, historically, have low enzyme production so I'm on the watch for any saliva problems. None so far. He is 3 yo. About once every 2 weeks, I use another product just to change up.

customer_reviews.author: Mari Ann Shake

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: I shared a small bag with some other dogs in the park...with their owner's permission of course, and they all loved it. We sprinkle it on his "dinner" daily. We used this on our other dog who lived to the age of 13, and his teeth were very white when he died, and never had to have dental treatments at the vet, so we know it works!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Bad breathe gone, clean teeth guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! My dog loves the treat and it helps her eat her food without any encouragement. Plus, she's getting a great teeth cleaner at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: gambitfu

customer_reviews.title: My 16-17 yr. old rescue doberman LOVES this on ...
customer_reviews.text: My 16-17 yr. old rescue doberman LOVES this on her food & it helps keep her teeth clean after her dental @ the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy dobie dog lady

customer_reviews.title: It can work well for some
customer_reviews.text: Our first two dogs we used this product on were finicky eaters, but they really liked the taste of DentaTreat so they ate meals at mealtime. We didn't notice a marked improvement in their dental health. Our current dog, a Maltese we adopted when he was 5 years old and missing many teeth, also loves this on his food. We notice a big improvement in the fragrance from his mouth and hope this means tartar is not building quickly. We'll continue giving him DentaTreat!
customer_reviews.author: Lani Ani

customer_reviews.title: He is regularly checked by a vet and they all say his there are great. They are also very white
customer_reviews.text: All my dogs have been on this. My one dog is now 11 and has never had to have his teeth cleaned. He is regularly checked by veterrinarians and they all say his teeth are great. They are also very white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad breath and whitening teeth...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for dogs who have yellow teeth and bad breath. I have been using this product for 6 months now....No more dental cleaning and no more brushing their teeth. The teeth look great and bad breath is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dentatreat
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on time. I use it for my two yorkies and am very satisfied. I have been using this for a long time. My babies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mare's

customer_reviews.title: I've had excellent results with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had excellent results with this product. What works best is to put a little bit on my finger and rub it on the teeth and gums of my two dogs every night. It lasts longer this way too.
customer_reviews.author: isa

customer_reviews.title: whiter teeth, healthier teeth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean tarter off of my dogs teeth, I have a friend who has used it with her dogs and their teeth are in great condition. I have been using it for 3 weeks and it is working, I am very excited about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Have already been through a small bottle of this for my puppy. Came highly recommended from another dog owner. My puppy likes it and is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to make a difference in my 4 cats teeth & gums.
customer_reviews.author: DPMinTexas

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: expensive, but helps to keep tartar from building up on my dogs teeth. does tend to whiten mostly at the lower portion of the tooth and not at the gum line. dogs seem to like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: jooleeji

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this since she was a puppy and she has never had a problem yet. Would recommend this for your dog daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary desmarais

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle it over my dog's food every meal and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great on my dogs. Love this product. I use it on all of my dogs and I've seen a difference in there teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Magnussen

customer_reviews.title: Wysong DentaTreat
customer_reviews.text: My dogs do not seem to like this when sprinkled on their food. How ever it does come HIGHLY recommended so will continue to work with them with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clean teeth & breath
customer_reviews.text: the product works! It takes a few months before you see results but sophie's teeth are cleaner and her breath is fresher as a result of using dentatreat.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Wysong denta-treat
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff on my dogs food for quite sometime, and I love it. Sometimes j just put some in my hand and let them lick it up so it really becomes a paste in thier mouth. It's keeping their teeth healthy and I've noticed if I run out of it and they don't get it for a little while, their breath will start to stink. So needless to say, I will continue to use this product on my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The research from Wysong makes this another great product. It's part of the lifelong Wysong feeding that I adhere to.
customer_reviews.author: Butchdog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've been using this foe 6 years. The vet is very impressed with all my dogs teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Charee Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your speedy order. We are giving it a try, and our dog loves the flavor. So, hopefully the tartar will be gone. JRE
customer_reviews.author: JANIE ROSE ENDRESS

product_meta.title: Wysong Dentatreat Canine/Feline - Dog/Cat Food Supplement - 9.5 Ounce Bottle
product_meta.description: A tasty and healthful dentifrice treat for dogs and cats, DentaTreat is an alternative natural approach to maintaining pet oral health by utilizing the scientifically-proven beneficial properties of cheeses, probiotics, minerals, and other natural ingredients. Composed of a special blend of dental-active natural cheeses, minerals, apple polyphenols and many other ingredients that help to maintain oral health, DentaTreat is a cat and dog supplement that can be easily sprinkled directly onto food, or it can also be used with a toothbrush as a tooth cleaning powder. DentaTreat dog & cat food supplement is made entirely of safe, high quality food ingredients and has no artificial colorings or flavorings.
feature_bullets: A Tasty, Effective, Natural Treat For The Oral Health Of Dogs And Cats. Easy To Feed. Can Be Sprinkled Directly Onto Food, Or Used With A Toothbrush As A Tooth Cleaning Powder

An Alternative Natural Approach To Maintaining Pet Oral Health By Utilizing The Scientifically-Proven Beneficial Properties Of Cheeses, Probiotics, Minerals, And Other Natural Ingredients. Made Entirely Of Safe, Healthful Food Ingredients. No Artificial Colorings Or Flavorings
Helps To Prevent Tooth Decay And Gingivitis, Remineralizes Teeth, And Discourages Growth Of Bacteria That Cause Plaque And Bad Breath. Also, Increases The Palatability Of Any Pet Foods
Dentatreat Has Benefited Thousands Of Pets Over Decades And Multiple Generations. Suitable For Dogs And Cats Of All Breeds, Sizes, And Life Stages
Wysong Has Been A Leader In Pet Nutrition Since 1979
